name: Tesseract Tango
description:
Play as a space pirate in search of an ancient Tesseract. A legendary weapon known for its ability to mutate itself in order to best serve its wielder. Use the three different forms of the Tesseract to defend yourself against the horde of aliens angered by the disturbance caused by the long dormant relic. 

GOAL

Survive for 3 minutes, just enough time for your ship to pick you up.

CONTROLS

Left click to Shoot 

WASD to Move

CREATED BY

Art — Mohammad Ashour

Code — Asfandyar Butt

SOURCED ASSETS

Win music from Gothicvania Rocky Pass by anzimus

Vfx from Voxel Arsenal by Archanor VFX

Gun Sfx from Sci-Fi Gun Sounds by  Cafofo

Background music from Fantasy Sounds Bundle by Cafofo
